episode.description: In this episode, we'll be digging deeper into the samurai legacies that have been preserved throughout Japan. You might be able to touch a hidden aspect of the samurai culture like swordsmith.
episode.subtitle: Samurai Legacy
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: From inns and hotels to coffee shops and subways, Japanese society is filled with the spirit of hospitality, called Omotenashi. It's all about making sure that people can live in peace and security.
episode.subtitle: Country of Omotenashi
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: Japanese winter has given rise to some unique customs and recreational activities. In this episode, we'll dive into some of Japan's incredible winter wonderland.
episode.subtitle: Japanese Winter Wonderland
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: The way Japanese live changes with the times, and so to do the things we use. In this new episode, we will deep look into the world of items used for daily life in Japan.
episode.subtitle: Everyday Tradition
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: Japan has come up with all kinds of ways to avert disaster. Today we look at the spiritual side of the equation with various ways to ward off evil. And we pray for the health of people of the world.
episode.subtitle: Warding Off Evil
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: It's been a year since the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic and efforts continue to alleviate the crisis. Join us on our new episode for a look into how Japan is responding to the challenge.
episode.subtitle: Pandemic Solutions
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: In Japan, people and animals live and work together in all kinds of ways. Join us in this new episode, as we dig deep to uncover some surprising examples of how the Japanese interact with animals.
episode.subtitle: Japanimals
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.description: Mild weather and a carpet of cherry blossoms make spring a special season for the people of Japan. In this episode, we will dig deep and greet the coming spring with highlights from NHK World Japan.
episode.subtitle: Spring Awakens
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.content: Tokyo is an internationally recognizable mega-city. 14 million people call the densely packed city of Tokyo home. But behind all the bright lights there is another city that's not so familiar. Please join this episode as we explore the unknown side of Tokyo.
episode.description: This is a program that introduces NHK WORLD's many attractive programs in fun short videos. The clips will also be introduced on social media to meet the needs of people who are interested in Japan.
episode.subtitle: Unknown Tokyo
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.content: From capsule toys to bonsai, in Japan miniaturization is no small matter. Even fishing rods could be minimized for tiny fish. In this episode, we will focus on the Japanese passion for all things miniscule, micro and mini.
episode.description: From capsule toys to Bonsai, in Japan miniaturization is no small matter. Even fishing rods could be minimized. We will focus on the Japanese passion for all things miniscule, micro and mini.
episode.subtitle: Japan in Miniature
episode.title: Dig More Japan

episode.content: Seasonal colors born of nature, or colors created by traditional craftsmen, Japan is full of colors. Let's explore through the world of unique colors in the country of the rising sun.
episode.description: Whether it be seasonal colors of nature, or those created by traditional craftsmen, Japan is full of hues. Please join us to explore the world of unique colors in the country of the rising sun.
episode.subtitle: Colorful Japan
episode.title: Dig More Japan
